text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Kvemo Kartli | native_name = ქვემო ქართლი | native_name_lang = ka | settlement_type = Mkhare (region) | image_map = Kvemo Kartli in Georgia (Georgian view).svg | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | seat = Rustavi | parts_type = Municipalities | parts_style = para | parts = | p1 = 6 municipalities and 1 city | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = Shota Rekhviashvili | area_total_km2 = 6527 | population_total = 423,986 | population_as_of = 2014 | population_density_km2 = auto |timezone = Georgian Time |utc_offset = +4 |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = | iso_code = GE-KK }} Kvemo Kartli is a region in Georgia. The capital city is Rustavi. Kvemo Kartli is divided into 6 municipalities and 1 special status city, Rustavi: Municipality/City Pop. (2014) Town/Village Pop.
